# performQuery(_:)

**Instance Method**

Returns all entities of the scene which pass the query.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency func performQuery(_ query: EntityQuery) -> QueryResult<Entity>
```

## Discussion

When in [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/System/update(context:)], call [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/SceneUpdateContext/entities(matching:updatingSystemWhen:)] instead of `performQuery`. This allows the [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/System] to sleep on some platforms when there is no matching component, reducing unnecessary work.

## Finding entities

- **findEntity(named:)**: Searches the scene’s anchor entity hierarchies for an entity with the given name.
- **findEntity(id:)**: Returns `Entity` with the given `Entity.ID` in the `Scene`.
